Detailed Description

A specialization of FloatDataProducer which gets data from another producer.

A specialization of FloatDataProducer class which works as a source of data vectors. Data vectors are stored at the internal DoubleDataProducer attribute. A context is added to data vectors, in order to being used as inputs of classifiers, as for example a neural network. Also, this object could normalize the data vectors substracting the mean and dividing by the standard deviation.
